Title: Directs the commissioner of health to establish a cannabis awareness program for youths age eighteen and younger
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health to establish a cannabis awareness program for youths age eighteen and younger designed to educate about the effects and risks associated with cannabis use, including that it is illegal for persons under the age of twenty-one.
LawCode: Amd ยง206, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to directing the commissioner of health to establish a cannabis awareness program for youths age eighteen and younger
